name: Life Adrift
description:
Fast-paced procedurally generated RPG for itch.io's Procedural Jam 2016. Randomly generated levels consisting of mob and boss rooms.

I would have loved to had done more with this but sadly I had university work during this jam. Might add more to it some day though.

ControlsCombat

Arrows Keys to move.

Z to attack.

SHIFT to dodge.

A to heal (costs 50 life essence).

S to eat a buffleberry (2x damage).

Farming

X to interact.

D to plant buffleberry seeds

The source code for this project can be seen at github.com/migiesmith/Life-Adrift

Music and sound generated using SFXR and Abundant Music.
